achievements.name: Savior

achievements.name: The One and Only
achievements.description: ME3: Defeat a group of Spectre-level opponents on Normal, Hardcore, or Insanity.

achievements.name: Insanity I
achievements.description: Complete Mass Effect 1, 2 or 3 on Insanity without changing difficulty

achievements.name: Insanity II
achievements.description: Complete two games in Mass Effect Legendary Edition on Insanity without changing difficulty

achievements.name: Insanity III
achievements.description: Complete all three games in Mass Effect Legendary Edition on Insanity without changing difficulty

achievements.name: Paramour I
achievements.description: Establish a romantic relationship in Mass Effect 1, 2 or 3

achievements.name: Paramour II
achievements.description: Establish or rekindle a romantic relationship in two games in Mass Effect Legendary Edition

achievements.name: Paramour III
achievements.description: Establish or rekindle a romantic relationship in all three games in Mass Effect Legendary Edition

achievements.name: Long Service Medal
achievements.description: Finish Mass Effect 1, 2 and 3 with the same character

achievements.name: Recruit
achievements.description: Kill 250 enemies in Mass Effect 1, 2 or 3

achievements.name: Soldier
achievements.description: Kill 1,000 enemies in Mass Effect 1, 2 or 3

achievements.name: Veteran
achievements.description: Kill 2,000 enemies in Mass Effect 1, 2 or 3

achievements.name: Bruiser
achievements.description: Kill 100 enemies with melee attacks in Mass Effect 1, 2 or 3
